sentence: Last week, the Republican Governors Association put $500,000 on a TV ad supporting Brian Kemp to help him fend off his primary challenge by former Senator David Perdue.
author: Adam Brewster
title: Senator Rick Scott says he will "absolutely" vote for McConnell to be leader

sentence: In this latest ad, Trump tells viewers, Brian Kemp let us down.
title: Policy priorities divide Senate Republicans
